text: Romanija is a mountain, karst plateau, and area in the Republika Srpska. Many towns are in the area, such as Pale, Sokolac, and Han Pijesak.Пале уживо: Новакова пећина крије тајне становника романијског платоа The highest point on the mountain is Veliki Lupoglav (1,652 m). A football club from the nearby town of Pale, FK Romanija, is named after the mountain. ==References== Category:Regions of Republika Srpska Category:Mountains of Europe Category:Geography of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Republika Srpska
title: Romanija
